IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_character_count') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_count GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_count @account_id dbo.id_t, @shard_id INT, @counts SMALLINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Character_Counts SET counts = @counts WHERE account_id = @account_id AND shard_id = @shard_id IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Character_Counts (account_id, shard_id, counts) VALUES (@account_id, @shard_id, @counts) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
